long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to scrape data from www.otto.de, one of the largest online shops in Germany. 

The result will be downloaded as a CSV file.

The free version allows you to scrape basic information such as product title and price for a single page. 

In the paid version, you can scrape all the information available for all pages, which offers valuable features. The list of all the information contains:
- Deal
- Product Image
- Badge
- Product Title
- Previous Price
- Price
- Rating Star
- Rating Number
- Reviews
- Installment
- Discount
- Benefit
- Sustainability
- Delivery
- Colors
- etc.
